title: AVAILABLE NOW! Luxury 2b2b2p w/in-unit W/D n upgrades in Emeryville
posting_body: ['Available NOW!!!', 'Luxury 2 bed 2 bath 2 parking with upgrades and in unit washer and dryer in secured building.', 'One of the most spacious floor plans.', 'Convenience', 'of well-maintained condo living with the feel of independent housing', 'Showing by appointment only.', 'Due to the volume of inquiries, no phone calls please.', 'Please send email by Click at “Request a tour” or “Check Availability” or “Email” with your credit report, we will contact you to schedule an appointment.', 'Check out the 3D Walk-in tour:', '<URL>', 'Unit features:', '- Third level unit located at Bridgewater, one of the most stylish, upbeat and energetic condominium community in Emeryville', '- Spacious and functional floor plan', '- Upgraded Stainless steel appliances: Refrigerator, oven/range, microwave, dishwasher and garbage disposal', '- Granite counter top in kitchen and both bathrooms', '- In unit Bosch Washer/Dryer', '- Triple pane windows (very quiet inside the unit; no sound of the freeways/Emeryville trains)', '- Extra storage in patio area', '- Walk-in closets:', 'Two', '- Heating:', 'Electricity heater separate in every room', '- 2 side by side designated parking space included in the rent with plenty of guest parking', 'Location:', '- Easy access to Freeways 880, 80, 580 and the Bay Bridge', '- Across the street Causal Carpool and transbay bus for easy commute to the City and free Emery Go', 'Round stop to Bart', '- 5 min walk to the hip Emery Bay Public Market with lots of food choices', '- Minutes from Bay Street Shopping Center, movie theater, grocery stores, restaurants, cafes and banks', 'Amenities:', '- Security and concierge', '- Off hours camera monitoring', '- Controlled access (multi-layered security)', '- Gated and secured access to covered parking garage', '- Package service (Security desk accepts packages, to be picked up later at a convenient time)', '- Business center/Conference room (24/7 access and free wifi)', '- Fully furnished Clubhouse (can be reserved for private use once every 6 months at no charge)', '- Pool and spa', '- Gym', '- Yoga Room', '- Massage Room', '- Sauna Room', '- Landscaped courtyard and BBQ area', '- Elevator', '- Free Charge Point stations for Electric car', '- Dry cleaning services', 'Lease Terms:', '- $3,200 monthly rent', '- $3,200 security deposit', '- Verified monthly gross household income 2.5X rent.', '- Credit score 700 or above', '- No pets', '- No Eviction record', '- No smoking', '- Tenant pays electricity and internet', '- Water, garbage, 2 side by side designated parking are included', '- Minimum 12-month lease', '- Deposit and 1st month rent (and any partial month rent) due at lease signing', "- Tenant required to carry renter's insurance policy ($500K liability)", "- Tenant agrees to abide by all Homeowner's Association Rules & Regulations", '- Preference will be given to early move-in qualified tenants', 'Offered and managed by The Cal Agents Realty, DRE# 02020017']
